title: Which response acquired through classical conditio

content.question: Which of the following is a response acquired through classical conditioning?

choices.label: A woman’s stomach growls when she looks at the clock and sees it is almost lunchtime.
A dog salivates at the taste of food.
A child cleans his room more often when he is rewarded for doing so.
A driver stops speeding after receiving a ticket.

content.answer: A woman’s stomach growls when she looks at the clock and sees it is almost lunchtime.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
